vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct module¶

Impact of Data Products module.

Provides classes for each the impact of data products supported within Vampire. New product impacts should be added here.

class vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.BaseImpactProduct[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for data product impact configuration objects.

Manages registration of data product impact configurations and creation of data product impact configuration objects. Data product impact configurations provide the ability to generate config file sections related to impact of the data product.

classmethod create(impact_type, country, valid_from_date, valid_to_date, vampire_defaults=None)[source]¶

Create impact of the specified type.

Creates the product impact identified by impact_type and sets initialization values.

Parameters:
  • impact_type (string) – Impact name.
  • country (string) – Country data product impact will be created for.
  • valid_from_date (datetime) – Date product impact is valid from.
  • valid_to_date (string) – Date product impact is valid until.
  • vampire_defaults (VampireDefaults) –
Returns:

Product impact object of type specified (a registered subclass of BaseImpactProduct).
classmethod register_subclass(impact_type)[source]¶

Register product impact with the productimpact manager.

Registers the data product impact identified by impact_type with the product impact manager. This allows the appropriate product impact to be created automatically when requested.

Parameters:impact_type (string) – Product name.
subclasses = {'days_since_last_rain_impact_area': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.DaysSinceLastRainAreaImpactProduct'>, 'days_since_last_rain_impact_popn': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.DaysSinceLastRainPopnImpactProduct'>, 'flood_forecast_impact_area': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.FloodAreaImpactProduct'>, 'flood_forecast_impact_popn': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.FloodPopnImpactProduct'>, 'vhi_impact_area': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.VHIAreaImpactProduct'>, 'vhi_impact_popn': <class 'vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.VHIPopnImpactProduct'>}¶
class vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.DaysSinceLastRainAreaImpactProduct(country, product_date, interval, vampire_defaults)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.BaseImpactProduct.BaseImpactProduct

generate_config(hazard_file, hazard_dir, hazard_pattern, boundary_file=None, boundary_dir=None, boundary_pattern=None, boundary_field=None, output_file=None, output_dir=None, output_pattern=None, masked=False)[source]¶

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VHI area impact for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • hazard_file (string) – File name of hazard image file.
  • hazard_dir (string) – Directory where the hazard file is located.
  • hazard_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the hazard file for the product date.
  • boundary_file (string) – Full path to the boundary file to use to calculate impact.
  • boundary_dir (string) – Directory where the boundary file is located.
  • boundary_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the boundary file.
  • boundary_field (string) – Field within the boundary file to use to identify areas.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for VHI area impact output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the VHI area impact output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the VHI area impact output file name. May refer to elements within the hazard_pattern.
  • masked (bool) – Flag indicating whether the impact should be masked by a boundary or not.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating VHI area impact.
Return type:

string
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate details related to VHI area impact that go in the config file header.

generate_publish_config()[source]¶

Generate config section to publish Flood population impact.

Generates configuration file section to publish the Flood population impact output file to a database.

Returns:Config file sections required for publishing Flood population impact.
Return type:string

Get date the output impact file is valid from.

valid_to_date¶

Get date the output impact file is valid until.

Days Since Last Rain product impact configuration.

Manages generation of configuration file sections for calculating impact of Days Since Last Rain on population.

Generate config file section for generating VCI.

Generate config file entries required to create VCI for the specified country, date and interval.

Parameters:
  • hazard_file (string) – File name of hazard image file.
  • hazard_dir (string) – Directory where the hazard file is located.
  • hazard_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the hazard file for the product date.
  • boundary_file (string) – Full path to the boundary file to use to calculate impact.
  • boundary_dir (string) – Directory where the boundary file is located.
  • boundary_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the boundary file.
  • boundary_field (string) – Field within the boundary file to use to identify areas.
  • population_file (string) – Full path to the file containing population data.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for VHI population impact output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the VHI population impact output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the VHI population impact output file name. May refer to elements within the hazard_pattern.
  • masked (bool) – Flag indicating whether the impact should be masked by a boundary or not.
Returns:

Config file sections required for generating VHI population impact.

  • boundary_file (string) – Full path to the boundary file to use to calculate impact.

  • output_filename (string) – Filename for Flood population impact output file.
  • output_dir (string) – Directory to save the Flood population impact output file.
  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the Flood population impact output file name. May refer to elements within the hazard_pattern.

  • hazard_dir (string) – Directory where the hazard file is located.
  • hazard_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the hazard file for the product date.
  • boundary_file (string) – Full path to the boundary file to use to calculate impact.
  • boundary_dir (string) – Directory where the boundary file is located.
  • boundary_pattern (string) – Regular expression pattern to used to find the boundary file.
  • boundary_field (string) – Field within the boundary file to use to identify areas.
  • output_filename (string) – Filename for VHI area impact output file.

  • output_pattern (string) – Pattern to be used to generate the VHI area impact output file name. May refer to elements within the hazard_pattern.
